data.name: The Death | Thần Trùng
data.detailed_description:
The Death | Thần Trùng is a Viet Nam psychological horror adventure game.
Note that the game has some creepy, startling and scary scenes. Some flashes of light can be annoying for sensitive people.

Plot: The game takes place in the city of Hanoi in 2021, the player plays the role of an ordinary young man like many people, but suddenly one day indescribable mysterious events happened to him. Of course, "there is no smoke without fire"... everything has a reason for it...

Gameplay: The game belongs to the psychological horror genre, explores the mystery of the "walking simulator" style and has some puzzles. So the playing time depends on each different player. The game also has different endings depending on the gameplay.
data.about_the_game:

Note that the game has some creepy, startling and scary scenes. Some flashes of light can be annoying for sensitive people.

Gameplay: The game belongs to the psychological horror genre, explores the mystery of the "walking simulator" style and has some puzzles. So the playing time depends on each different player. The game also has different endings depending on the gameplay.
data.short_description: The Death | Thần Trùng is a Viet Nam psychological horror adventure game made by three Vietnamese people from a tiny indie studio. The game takes place in Hanoi city in 2021.
data.supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Vietnamese*, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+ x64
  • Processor: Intel/Amd
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia/Amd
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Wear headphones and play in the dark.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel/Amd
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia/Amd
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Wear headphones and play in the dark.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Suicide, Gore, Violence, Psychological fear, General mature content.
